0011.HK.summary: Hang Seng Bank Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides various banking and related financial services to individual, corporate, commercial, small and medium-sized enterprise, and institutional customers in Hong Kong, Mainland China, and internationally. It operates through four segments: Retail Banking and Wealth Management, Commercial Banking, Global Banking and Markets, and Other. The company offers personal banking services, including current and savings accounts, time deposits, mortgages and personal loans, credit cards, and insurance and wealth management services, as well as consumer lending services. It also provides corporate lending, trade and receivable finance, payments and cash management, treasury and foreign exchange, general insurance, key-person insurance, investment, and corporate wealth management services, as well as general banking, interest rate, money market, structured, derivative products, etc. In addition, the company offers trustee, nominee, fund management, stock broking, and property management services, as well as index compilation and licensing; fund raising and sales; and asset management services. It operates approximately 290 service outlets in Hong Kong; branches in Macau and Singapore; and a representative office in Taipei. Hang Seng Bank Limited, through its subsidiary, Hang Seng Bank (China) Limited, operates a mainland China network with outlets in the Pearl River delta, the Yangtze River delta, the Bohai Rim region, and Midwest China. The company was founded in 1933 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Hang Seng Bank Limited is a subsidiary of The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Limited.

0030.HK.summary: Ban Loong Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the money lending, and trading of goods and commodities in Hong Kong and the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Money Lending and Trading Segments. It provides short-term personal and corporate loans; and trades in refined edible oil, sugar, cosmetic, and personal care products. The company was formerly known as ABC Communications (Holdings) Limited and changed its name to Ban Loong Holdings Limited in October 2015. Ban Loong Holdings Limited is based in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

0033.HK.summary: Amber Hill Financial Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, primarily engages in the trading of party products, and metals and minerals in Hong Kong and North America. It trades in party accessories, decorations, cutlery, and eatery wares. The company also provides securities brokerage and asset management services. In addition, it is involved in the personal and corporate loans business; credit guarantee and investment activities; and trading of security products and provision of security services, as well as advancing business. The company was formerly known as China Cloud Copper Company Limited and changed its name to Amber Hill Financial Holdings Limited in July 2020. Amber Hill Financial Holdings Limited was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

0111.HK.summary: Cinda International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides asset management services in Hong Kong and Mainland China. The company operates through Asset Management, Sales and Trading Business, and Corporate Finance segments. The Asset Management segment provides advisory service and related auxiliary services on fund management, as well as other related proprietary investment services; and manages private funds. The Sales and Trading Business segment offers broking services in securities, equity linked products, unit trusts, stock options, and commodities and futures contracts, as well as underwriting, placing, and margin financing services to broking clients. This segment also acts as an agent for the sale of savings plans, general and life insurance, and other investment linked insurance products. The Corporate Finance segment offers corporate finance and advisory services on equity and debt financing to companies listed or seeking listing on Hong Kong or other stock exchanges; and other unlisted corporates. The company also offers fund management, financial planning, and private equity investment services; and administrative support, research, and consultancy services, as well as acts as a money lender. It serves individuals, corporates, enterprises, and institutional customers. The company was formerly known as Hantec Investment Holdings Limited and changed its name to Cinda International Holdings Limited in November 2008. Cinda International Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Cinda International Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Cinda Securities Co., Ltd.

0165.HK.summary: China Everbright Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the investment activities and provision of financial services in Hong Kong and Mainland China. The company invests in unlisted equity securities or equity derivatives, as well as in the areas of new economy, artificial intelligence and advanced manufacturing, new energy, medical care and senior healthcare, overseas acquisition and infrastructure, real estate, aircraft industry chain, mezzanine fund, and others. It also focuses on investing in aircraft leasing, artificial intelligence of things, and elderly care industry platforms; and investing in equity, debts, structured products, and other products. In addition, the company provides a range of financial services, including asset management, investment management, and investment advisory services related to absolute return funds, bond funds, and equity funds, as well as offers management, treasury management, secretarial, money lending, fund management, venture capital, leasing, and consultancy services. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hong Kong. China Everbright Limited is a subsidiary of Honorich Holdings Limited.

0174.HK.summary: Gemini Investments (Holdings) Limited, an investment holding company, engages in fund platform, property investment and development, fund investments, and securities investment businesses. It is also involved in provision of project management; securities investment and trading; fund management; and real estate consultancy services. In addition, the company invests in real estate fund platform; leases office properties and residential condominium; and provides management and administration services for property development project. It has operations in Hong Kong, the United States, Australia, the People's Republic of China, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Gemini Property Investments Limited and changed its name to Gemini Investments (Holdings) Limited in July 2011. The company was incorporated in 1987 and is based in Central, Hong Kong.

0188.HK.summary: Sunwah Kingsway Capital Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides various financial services in Hong Kong, the People's Republic of China, and internationally. It operates through Proprietary Investment, Property Investment, Brokerage and Financing, Corporate Finance and Capital Markets, Asset Management, and Others segments. The Proprietary Investment segment invests in securities for treasury and liquidity management, as well as in structured deals, including listed and unlisted equities, debt securities, and investment funds. The Property Investment segment invests in properties for rental income. The Brokerage and Financing segment offers securities, options, funds, futures, and commodities brokerage services; and margin and other financing, factoring, and other related services. The Corporate Finance and Capital Markets segment provides financial advisory services to corporate clients; and acts as an underwriting and placing agent in the equity capital market. The Asset Management segment offers asset management and related advisory services to private equity funds and private clients. The Others segment provides management, administrative, and corporate secretarial services, as well as loan financing and leasing services. The company was formerly known as SW Kingsway Capital Holdings Limited and changed its name to Sunwah Kingsway Capital Holdings Limited in September 2011. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

0211.HK.summary: Styland Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the financial services, mortgage financing, property development and investment, and securities trading businesses in Hong Kong. The company's Financial Services segment offers securities and futures dealing, brokerage financing, corporate finance, asset management, and other financing services, as well as other equity and debt financing solutions. This segment also provides margin financing services for trading stocks and other listed securities, and for subscribing to new shares in initial public offerings; and stock broking and online stock trading services for Hong Kong listed companies, institutional investors, professionals, and individual investors. Its Mortgage Financing segment provides loans to individuals, corporations, and institutions that are secured by real properties. The company's Property Development and Investment segment is involved in the property redevelopment activities, as well as properties letting business. Its Securities Trading segment trades in securities and derivative products. The company also provides management and strategic investment services. Styland Holdings Limited was founded in 1977 and is based in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong.

0218.HK.summary: Shenwan Hongyuan (H.K.) Limited, an investment holding company, engages in brokerage, corporate finance, asset management, financing and loan, and investment and other businesses in Hong Kong. The company operates in five segments: Enterprise Finance, Personal Finance and Wealth Management, Institutional Services and Trading, Investment Management, and Others. It offers stock underwriting sponsor, bond underwriting, and financial advisory services for corporate clients; and external equity investment, debt investment, other investments, and structured financing solutions. The company also provides securities, futures, and options brokerage services; and wealth management, OTC, and securities margin financing products to individual customers and non-professional institutional investors. In addition, it provides stock brokerage and trading services; research advisory, and investment and financing solutions; and sales, trading, hedging, and over-the-counter derivative services to institutional clients, as well as sells and trades in fixed income bonds, currencies, and commodities. Further, the company offers asset management, investment advisory, and public and private fund management services. Additionally, it offers management and treasury, and share custodian and nominee services; leases computer equipment; and holds properties. The company was formerly known as Shenyin Wanguo (H.K.) Limited and changed its name to Shenwan Hongyuan (H.K.) Limited in May 2015. Shenwan Hongyuan (H.K.) Limited was incorporated in 1972 and is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

0223.HK.summary: Elife Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides commodities trading and esmart digital services in China, Hong Kong, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Unconventional Gas Business, Commodities Trading Business, and Esmart Digital Services. It offers unconventional gas related services, as well as imports technical equipment for the unconventional gas industry; and commodities trading and agency services. The company also provides cloud data smart platform and commercial terminals for shop management. It serves retail stores, convenience stores, small-to-medium sized supermarkets, gas stations, pharmacies, tobacco and wine specialty shops, China Post network, small servicing spots, apparel chain stores, etc. The company was formerly known as Sino Resources Group Limited and changed its name to Elife Holdings Limited in November 2016. Elife Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Hong Kong, Hong Kong.

0245.HK.long_name: China Vered Financial Holding Corporation Limited
0245.HK.summary: China Vered Financial Holding Corporation Limited, an investment holding company, provides asset management, consultancy, financing, and securities advisory and brokerage services. It also provides insurance agency and money lending services. The company was formerly known as China Minsheng Financial Holding Corporation Limited and changed its name to China Vered Financial Holding Corporation Limited in July 2020. China Vered Financial Holding Corporation Limited is based in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong.

0299.HK.summary: Glory Sun Land Group Limited, an investment holding company, engages in property development and investment business in the People's Republic of China. It operates through seven segments: Yacht Club; Education; Real Estates and Property Investment; Trading of Commodities; Construction; Provision of Online Game Services; and Others. The company also operates a yacht club and golf practice court; provides education and training services; designs, develops, and operates mobile and web games, as well as platform services; and trades in commodities and seafood. It also involved in the provision of construction works. The company was formerly known as New Sports Group Limited and changed its name to Glory Sun Land Group Limited in September 2015. Glory Sun Land Group Limited was founded in 1995 and is based in Admiralty, Hong Kong.

0335.HK.summary: Upbest Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides a range of financial services primarily in Hong Kong and Macau. The company operates through seven segments: Broking, Financing, Corporate Finance, Assets Management, Property Investment, Precious Metal Trading, and Investment Holding. Its activities include securities and futures brokerage; securities margin financing and money lending; corporate finance advisory, placing, and underwriting; assets management for listed and unlisted companies, and high net worth individuals; precious metal trading; and share investments. The company is also involved in the property rental, management, and related businesses. Upbest Group Limited was founded in 1988 and is based in Central, Hong Kong. Upbest Group Limited is a subsidiary of CCAA Group Limited.

0376.HK.summary: Yunfeng Financial Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides insurance products in Hong Kong and Macau. The company operates in two segments, Insurance Products, and Other Financial Services and Corporate. It provides a range of insurance products, including life insurance, medical insurance, annuities, pension, and mandatory provident fund schemes. The company also provides fund and asset management services, as well as financing and investing solutions; and corporate advisory, and securities placing and underwriting advisory services. In addition, it engages in financial technology activities; and provision of employee stock ownership plan administration and principal investment. Further, the company provides administrative, trustee, and general services; agency services to non-life insurers; marketing and promoting products, and public relations services; Internet and multimedia systems, and application development services; and technological development of computer software and hardware, technical consulting, technology services, and database and computer network services. The company was formerly known as REORIENT GROUP LIMITED and changed its name to Yunfeng Financial Group Limited in October 2016. The company is based in Central, Hong Kong. Yunfeng Financial Group Limited is a subsidiary of Yunfeng Financial Holdings Limited.

0412.HK.long_name: China Shandong Hi-Speed Financial Group Limited
0412.HK.summary: China Shandong Hi-Speed Financial Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides various financial services in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through four segments: Investments in Securities, Money Lending, Financial Leasing, and Financial Technology. The Investments in Securities segment purchases and sells securities and derivatives; and holds equity and debt investments. The Money Lending segment provides money lending and advisory services. The Financial Leasing segment primarily is involved in the provision of direct financial leasing and advisory services, as well as operation of an asset trading platform. The Financial Technology segment offers online investment and technology enabled lending services; and online new media services. It also provides corporate, business factoring, securities brokerage, asset management, financial investments, investment management, and related financial services; and issues guaranteed bonds and perpetual securities. The company was formerly known as China Innovative Finance Group Limited and changed its name to China Shandong Hi-Speed Financial Group Limited in October 2017. China Shandong Hi-Speed Financial Group Limited is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

0428.HK.summary: Cocoon Holdings Limited is a principal investment firm specializing in investments in listed and unlisted companies. The firm typically invests in the fields of resources, technology enabled manufacturing, food and retail and healthcare. It also offers other investment services that include money market instruments, capital syndication, and arranging strategic corporate deals, with an emphasis on financial restructuring and capital infusion. The firm invests in Asia and the Greater China region. Cocoon Holdings Limited, formerly known as Huge China Holdings Limited, was founded in 1993 and is based in Hong Kong with additional office in Hamilton, Bermuda.

0440.HK.summary: Dah Sing Financial Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides banking, insurance, financial, and other related services in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Personal Banking, Commercial Banking, Treasury, Overseas Banking, and Insurance segments. The Personal Banking segment accepts various deposits from individual customers; and provides residential mortgage loans, personal loans, overdrafts, vehicle financing, and credit card services, as well as insurance sales and investment services. The Commercial Banking segment accepts various deposits; and offers loans and working capital financing to commercial, industrial, and institutional customers, as well as trade financing services. The Treasury segment provides foreign exchange services; cash management services for deposit taking and lending; and interest rate risk management services. It also manages investment in securities. The Overseas Banking segment offers personal and commercial banking products and services. The Insurance Business segment is involved in the insurance and pension fund management business. The company also provides insurance agency, nominee, and securities dealing services; and invest in properties. The company was formerly known as Fivetech Investments Limited and changed its name to Dah Sing Financial Holdings Limited in July 1987. Dah Sing Financial Holdings Limited was incorporated in 1987 and is based in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

0508.HK.summary: Dingyi Group Investment Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the loan financing and financial leasing businesses in the Mainland China and Hong Kong. The company is also involved in the sale of food and beverages; securities trading; and properties development businesses. In addition, it engages in the trading of wine; investment advisory; and restaurant operation businesses. The company was formerly known as Chevalier Pacific Holdings Limited and changed its name to Dingyi Group Investment Limited in February 2012. The company is based in Wanchai, Hong Kong.

0612.HK.long_name: China Ding Yi Feng Holdings Limited
0612.HK.summary: China Ding Yi Feng Holdings Limited is a publicly owned investment manager. The firm invests in the private equity, and venture capital markets across the globe. The firm also invests in e-commerce & internet services and high technology industry. The firm seeks to invest in listed and unlisted companies in the PRC and Hong Kong. The firm employs a combination of quantitative and qualitative analysis to create its investment portfolios. It was formerly known as China Investment Fund International Holdings Limited. China Ding Yi Feng Holdings Limited was established in 2001 and is based in Wanchai, Hong Kong.

0622.HK.summary: Oshidori International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides financial services in Hong Kong. It offers securities brokerage, placing and underwriting, consultancy and corporate finance advisory, money lending, investment advisory, asset management, margin financing, and proprietary trading services, as well as engages in trading and investment of securities. The company also provides nominee and management services; and holds yachts and motor vehicles. The company was formerly known as Enerchina Holdings Limited and changed its name to Oshidori International Holdings Limited in April 2019. Oshidori International Holdings Limited is based in North Point, Hong Kong.

0628.HK.summary: Gome Finance Technology Co., Ltd., an investment holding company, provides various financial services in Hong Kong and People's Republic of China. The company offers commercial factoring, financial leasing, personal property pawn loans, real estate mortgage loans, and money lending services. It also provides consultancy and technical advisory services. The company was formerly known as Sino Credit Holdings Limited and changed its name to Gome Finance Technology Co., Ltd. in February 2017. The company is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Gome Finance Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Swiree Capital Limited.

0665.HK.summary: Haitong International Securities Group Limited provides financial products and services to corporate, institutional, and retail clients worldwide. The Wealth Management segment offers financial services and investment solutions to retail and high net-worth clients. This segment engages in securities broking and dealing, futures, and options contracts; foreign exchange trading; over the counter products and risk management instruments sales; securities margin financing; and the provision of investment advisory, financial planning, and investment funds distribution services, as well and custodian services. The Corporate Finance segment provides sponsoring and underwriting services for fund raising activities in equity and debt capital markets. This segment also offers advisory services and financing solutions for corporate actions, such as mergers and acquisitions, assets restructuring, etc. The Asset Management segment offers investment management services, including public funds, private funds, and mandatory provident funds to individual, corporate, and institutional clients. The Institutional Clients segment provides cash equities sales and trading; brokerage; stock borrowing and lending; equity research; investment and financing solutions; and financial instruments, such as fixed income products, currency and commodity products, futures and options, exchange traded funds, and derivative products in financial centers for institutional clients. The Investment segment invests in investment funds and private equity investments. The company was formerly known as Taifook Securities Group Limited and changed its name to Haitong International Securities Group Limited in November 2010. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Haitong International Securities Group Limited operates as a subsidiary of Haitong International Holdings Limited.

0666.HK.summary: SHK Hong Kong Industries Limited is a publicly owned investment manager. The company invests primarily in telecommunications, properties for sale and rent, infrastructure and logistics, hotel operation, food and beverage, and transportation sectors. It prefers to invest in Hong Kong, Singapore, United States, Japan, Malaysia, Taiwan, and China. SHK Hong Kong Industries Limited was formerly known as Yu Ming Investments Limited. SHK Hong Kong Industries Limited was founded in 1990 and is based in Wanchai, Hong Kong.

0668.HK.summary: Doyen International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the provision of loan financing services in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Investment Property Holding, Dongkui Business, and Sales of Flowers and Plants segments. It is also involved in the investment and rental of properties. The company owns Dong Dong Mall, a shopping arcade with a total gross floor area of 18,043.45 square meters located in Chongqing. In addition, it provides management services; and sells flowers, seedlings, and plants. The company was formerly known as Dowell Property Holdings Limited and changed its name to in Doyen International Holdings Limited in June 2016. Doyen International Holdings Limited is based in Wanchai, Hong Kong. Doyen International Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Money Success Limited.

0717.HK.summary: Emperor Capital Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides a range of financial services in Hong Kong, the United States, and internationally. The company operates through Financing, Brokerage, Placing and Underwriting, and Corporate Finance segments. It offers commercial and personal loans comprising short-term unsecured loans, such as tax loans, bridging loans, term loans, and personal loans, as well as long-term secured loans, including property mortgage loans; and margin and initial public offering (IPO) financing. The company also provides brokerage services for securities, futures, and options traded on the exchanges in Hong Kong, Mainland China, and overseas countries; wealth management services, such as providing advice regarding an array of investment services, including securities, mutual funds, insurance-linked products, and real estate investment; asset management services; and discretionary investment services. In addition, it offers placing and underwriting services, as well as acts as a placing agents and underwriters for various Hong Kong listed companies; and corporate finance advisory services on takeovers code related transactions and undertakes sponsor work for IPOs, as well as provides advisory for corporate transactions, including placing, rights issue, corporate restructuring, and merger and acquisition services. Further, the company provides promotion and marketing, and insurance and other brokerage services. Emperor Capital Group Limited was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Wanchai, Hong Kong. Emperor Capital Group Limited is a subsidiary of Emperor Capital Group Holdings Limited.

0730.HK.summary: Shougang Concord Grand (Group) Limited, an investment holding company, provides finance leasing and other financial services in Mainland China and Hong Kong. It operates through three divisions: Finance Leasing and Other Financial Services, Property Leasing and Building Management Services, and Assets Management. The company offers finance leasing for various sectors, including energy, transport, printing equipment, medical equipment, scientific and technical equipment, industrial equipment, etc. It is also involved in the investment, leasing, sale, and management of properties, such as industrial, office, and residential buildings; provision of property consultant, administrative and management, and referral and corporate financial advisory services; and investment and management of industrial funds. Shougang Concord Grand (Group) Limited has a strategic cooperation agreement with Jingdong Digits Technology Holding Co., Ltd. for cooperation in the field of supply chain business. The company is based in Wan Chai, Hong Kong. Shougang Concord Grand (Group) Limited is a subsidiary of Wheeling Holdings Limited.

0764.HK.summary: Eternity Investment Limited, an investment holding company, primarily engages in the sale of financial assets and money lending businesses. The company operates in four segments: Property Investment, Sale of Financial Assets, Money Lending, and Sale of Jewelry Products. It also designs and sells jewelry products; sells precious stones; and leases rental properties. In addition, the company manages membership-based golf club and resort that provides recreational and wellness services; provides property development and property management services; and manages and operates cultural forum and related cultural activities. It operates in Hong Kong, the People's Republic of China, Australia, Europe, and the United States. The company was formerly known as China Star Investment Holdings Limited and changed its name to Eternity Investment Limited in June 2010. Eternity Investment Limited is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

0804.HK.summary: Pinestone Capital Limited, an investment holding company, provides financial services to individual and corporate clients in Hong Kong. It offers securities brokerage services; securities-backed lending services, including margin financing and money lending services; and placing and underwriting services. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Pinestone Capital Limited is a subsidiary of HCC & Co. Limited.

0900.HK.summary: AEON Credit Service (Asia) Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the consumer finance business primarily in Hong Kong. The company operates through three segments: Credit Card, Personal Loans, and Insurance. The Credit Card segment offers credit card services to individuals; and acquiring services for member stores. The Personal Loans segment provides personal loan financing services to individuals. The Insurance segment offers insurance agency and brokerage services. The company was incorporated in 1990 and is based in Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong. AEON Credit Service (Asia) Company Limited is a subsidiary of AEON Financial Service (Hong Kong) Co., Limited.

0913.HK.summary: Unity Investments Holdings, Ltd. and its subsidiaries engage primarily in investment holding in listed and unlisted companies. The firm invests in both listed and unlisted companies, and the current core portfolio comprises of mainly small to medium sized listed companies. It invests in a wide array of industries and sectors like securities investment companies and companies engaging in the businesses of infrastructure, manufacturing, trading, information technologies, media, energy, property investment and securities investment. Unity Investments Holdings, Ltd. is based in Hong Kong.

0952.HK.summary: China Tonghai International Financial Limited, an investment holding company, provides various financial services in Hong Kong. It operates through Brokerage and Interest Income, Corporate Finance, Asset Management, Investments, and Others segments. The Brokerage and Interest Income segment provides discretionary and non-discretionary dealing services for securities, futures, and options; margin financing and money lending services; and insurance broking and wealth management services, as well as earns interest income from debt instruments. The corporate finance offers securities placing, underwriting, and corporate finance and general advisory services. The Asset Management segment provides fund management, discretionary portfolio management, and portfolio management advisory services. The Investments segment invests in and trades in various investment products. The Others segment offers financial media services. It also provides import/export trading, and Website management and other related services. The company was formerly known as China Oceanwide International Financial Limited and changed its name to China Tonghai International Financial Limited in May 2018. China Tonghai International Financial Limited was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. China Tonghai International Financial Limited is a subsidiary of Oceanwide Holdings International Financial Development Co., Ltd.

0966.HK.long_name: China Taiping Insurance Holdings Company Limited
0966.HK.summary: China Taiping Insurance Holdings Company Limited, an investment holding company, underwrites direct life insurance, property and casualty insurance, and various classes of reinsurance products in People's Republic of China and internationally. It operates through Life Insurance Business, PRC Property and Casualty Insurance Business, Overseas Property and Casualty Insurance Business, Reinsurance Business, Pension and Group Life Insurance Business, and Other Businesses segments. The company's life insurance products include individual and group life insurance, health insurance, accident insurance, and annuity. Its property and casualty insurance products comprise compulsory motor insurance; and liability insurance, credit insurance, guarantee insurance, and short-term accident and health insurance, as well as related reinsurance products. The company's reinsurance portfolio covers property damage, life, marine cargo and hull, and miscellaneous non-marine classes. The company is also involved in the pension, assets management, insurance intermediary, financial leasing, property investment, securities dealing and broking, and elderly care investment businesses; and manages investment funds. In addition, it provides back to back financing arrangement, and insurance broking and agency services. The company was formerly known as China Insurance International Holdings Company Limited and changed its name to China Taiping Insurance Holdings Company Limited in August 2009. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in North Point, Hong Kong. China Taiping Insurance Holdings Company Limited is a subsidiary of China Taiping Insurance Group (HK) Company Limited.

0993.HK.summary: Huarong International Financial Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides financial services in Hong Kong and the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Securities, Corporate Finance, and Asset Management and Direct Investment segments. The Securities segment engages in the broking and dealing of securities, futures, and options contracts; and provision of margin financing services. The Corporate Finance segment offers securities underwriting and sponsoring, and financial advisory services to institutional clients. The Asset Management and Direct Investment segment provides asset management services; and makes direct investments in equities, bonds, funds, derivative instruments, and other financial products. Huarong International Financial Holdings Limited also offers sub-leasing arrangement, money lending, and consultancy services. The company was formerly known as Simsen International Corporation Limited and changed its name to Huarong International Financial Holdings Limited in October 2015. The company is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Huarong International Financial Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Camellia Pacific Investment Holding Limited.

1051.HK.summary: G-Resources Group Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the principal investment, financial services, and real property businesses. The company is involved in the provision of various financial services, including securities brokerage services, placing and underwriting services, corporate finance advisory services, provision of margin financing, money lending business, investment advisory and management services, and asset management services, as well as securities investment business. It also provides trust and company services; and fund investment services. The company operates in Singapore, Hong Kong, the United States, Europe, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Smart Rich Energy Finance (Holdings) Limited and changed its name to G-Resources Group Limited in June 2009. G-Resources Group Limited is headquartered in Wanchai, Hong Kong.

1141.HK.summary: CMBC Capital Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides loan financing services primarily in Hong Kong. It operates through Securities; Investment and Financing; and Asset Management, Corporate Finance and Advisory segments. The Securities segment offers brokerage, securities margin financing, futures and options contracts dealing, and securities underwriting/placing services. The Investment and Financing segment invests and trades in equity and debt securities, bonds, and funds. The Asset Management and Advisory segment provides asset management, sponsorship, and financial advisory and arrangement services. It also offers corporate financing services. The company was formerly known as Skyway Securities Group Limited and changed its name to CMBC Capital Holdings Limited in May 2017. The company is headquartered in Kowloon, Hong Kong. CMBC Capital Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of CMBC International Investment Limited.

1319.HK.long_name: Oi Wah Pawnshop Credit Holdings Limited
1319.HK.summary: Oi Wah Pawnshop Credit Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the provision of secured financing services to high-net-worth customers in Hong Kong. It offers mortgage and pawn loans, and money lending services, as well as consulting services. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong. Oi Wah Pawnshop Credit Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Kwan Lik Holding Limited.

1469.HK.summary: Get Nice Financial Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides financial services in Hong Kong. It operates through three segments: Broking, Securities Margin Financing, and Corporate Finance. The company offers securities dealing and broking, futures and options broking, and underwriting and placement services; securities margin financing; and corporate finance and advisory services. In addition, it is involved in the provision of asset management services, as well as property and yacht holding activities. The company is based in Central, Hong Kong. Get Nice Financial Group Limited operates as a subsidiary of Get Nice Holdings Limited.

1788.HK.summary: Guotai Junan International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides wealth management, brokerage, corporate finance, asset management, loans and financing, financial products, and market making and investment services in Hong Kong and internationally. The company's Brokerage segment is involved in securities, futures, options, and leveraged foreign exchange dealing and brokerage; and the provision of insurance brokerage services. Its Corporate Finance segment provides advisory services; and placing and underwriting services of debt and equity securities. The company's Asset Management segment offers asset management services comprising fund management and investment advisory services. Its Loans and Financing segment provides margin financing products, securities borrowing and lending to margin customers, initial public offering loans, other loans to customers, and bank deposits. The company's Financial Products, Market Making and Investments segment offers funds, fixed income securities, and equity investments, as well as structuring of financial products; and trades in and markets debt securities, exchange traded funds, and derivatives. Its Other segment provides information channel services. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Central, Hong Kong. Guotai Junan International Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Guotai Junan Holdings Limited.

2003.HK.summary: VCREDIT Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides online consumer finance services to prime and near-prime borrowers in China. The company offers credit card balance transfer and consumption credit products. It also provides loan facilitation, guarantee, micro credit, and financial leasing services, as well as technology services. The company was formerly known as Vision Capital Group Limited. VCREDIT Holdings Limited was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Admiralty, Hong Kong.

2263.HK.summary: Fu Shek Financial Holdings Limited, through its subsidiary, Sinomax Securities Limited provides securities trading, placing, and underwriting services in the People's Republic of China. It offers securities dealing, brokerage, and ancillary services; and margin financing and investment advisory services. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Admiralty, Hong Kong.

2323.HK.summary: Renco Holdings Group Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells printed circuit boards. The company operates through three segments: Manufacturing, Treasury Investments, and Financial Services. It is also involved in the investment and trading of securities and related treasury activities; and provision of securities advisory and asset management services. In addition, the company engages in the provision of information system management services; consultancy and corporate solution services; fund management and investment services; and equity and debt investments. It operates in the People's Republic of China, Singapore, Thailand, Malaysia, Germany, Poland, other European countries, the United States, Korea, Japan, and internationally. The company was formerly known as HKBridge Financial Holdings Limited and changed its name to Renco Holdings Group Limited in July 2020. Renco Holdings Group Limited was founded in 1985 and is based in Hong Kong, Hong Kong.

2356.HK.summary: Dah Sing Banking Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides banking, financial, and other related services in Hong Kong, Macau, and the People's Republic of China. It operates through Personal Banking, Commercial Banking, Treasury, and Overseas Banking segments. The Personal Banking segment accepts deposits from individual customers; and provides residential mortgage lending, personal loans, overdrafts, vehicle financing, and credit card services, as well as insurance sales and investment services. The Commercial Banking segment accepts deposits; offers loans and working capital financing to commercial, industrial, and institutional customers; and provides trade financing services. The Treasury segment provides foreign exchange services; cash management services for deposit taking and lending; and interest rate risk management services, as well as manages investments in securities. The Overseas Banking segment engages in the personal banking and commercial banking business activities in Macau and the People's Republic of China. The company is also involved in the property investment and securities dealing activities; and provision of nominee services. As of December 31, 2018, it had a branch network of 45 retail branches, 23 VIP centers, and 36 securities trading centers. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Wan Chai, Hong Kong. Dah Sing Banking Group Limited operates as a subsidiary of Dah Sing Financial Holdings Limited.

The company operates through Brokerage, Corporate Finance and Underwriting, Asset Management and Advisory, Margin Financing, and Investment and Loans segments. The Brokerage segment trades in stocks, bonds, futures, options, and other marketable securities. The Corporate Finance and Underwriting segment provides corporate finance services, including equity underwriting, debt underwriting, sponsor services, and financial advisory services to institutional clients. The Asset Management and Advisory segment offers traditional asset management products and services to third party clients; and investment advisory, portfolio management, and transaction execution services. The Margin Financing segment provides securities-backed financial leverage for retail and institutional clients. The Investment and Loans segment engages in direct investment business, including investments in various debt and equity securities, investment in companies, and investment in loans. The company was formerly known as BOCOM Securities Company Limited and changed its name to BOCOM International Holdings Company Limited in May 2007. 3618.HK.long_name: Chongqing Rural Commercial Bank Co., Ltd.

It operates in three segments: Corporate Banking, Personal Banking, and Financial Market Operations. The Corporate Banking segment offers financial products and services, including deposit takings, corporate loans, trade financing, financial leasing, and other corporate intermediary services to corporations, government agencies, and financial institutions. The Personal Banking segment provides financial products and services, such as deposit products, personal loans, cards, personal wealth management services, and other types of personal intermediary services to individual customers. The Financial Market Operations segment conducts money market or repurchase transactions; and invests in debt instruments on behalf of customers. The company also provides mobile banking, Internet banking, and telephone banking services. As of 31 December 2019, it operated 1,774 branches including the headquarter and business department, 6 branches, 35 first-level sub-branches, 117 second-level sub-branches, 2 community branch outlets, and 1,612 branch outlets; and 4,911 ATMs and self-service inquiry terminals. The Institutional Clients segment provides cash equities sales and trading; brokerage; stock borrowing and lending; equity research; investment and financing solutions; and financial instruments, such as fixed income products, currency and commodity products, futures and options, exchange traded funds, and derivative products in financial centers for institutional clients. The Investment segment invests in investment funds and private equity investments. The company was formerly known as Taifook Securities Group Limited and changed its name to Haitong International Securities Group Limited in November 2010. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Haitong International Securities Group Limited operates as a subsidiary of Haitong International Holdings Limited.

TJV.F.summary: Southwest Securities International Securities Limited provides various financial services in Hong Kong. It operates through Brokerage and Margin Financing, Corporate Finance, Asset Management, and Proprietary Trading segments. It acts as financial advisor for mergers and acquisitions, reorganizations, general offers, acquisition financing, and private equity transactions; and a compliance and independent financial adviser. The company also offers debt products, including investment-grade, high-yield, convertible, preferred stock, and panda bonds; equity capital market services; asset management services and advice on securities for corporations, institutions, and high-net-worth individuals. In addition, it is involved in the stock brokerage, securities margin financing and underwriting, subscription of initial public offering, placement of shares, bonds brokerage, and exchange traded fund activities, as well as the trading of real estate investment trust, stock warrants, stock options, and CBBCs. Further, the company offers consultation and trading services in the futures market, as well as custodian services; cash management and financing, investment management, wealth planning, and insurance planning services; investment products, such as equity, fixed income, and alternative assets; insurance products; investment immigration services; and loan services to allow individuals and corporate clients. Additionally, it distributes unit trusts, mutual funds, investment- linked, and mandatory provident fund products; and provides personal financial consulting and planning, and insurance broking services. The company was formerly known as Tanrich Financial Holdings Limited and changed its name to Southwest Securities International Securities Limited in May 2015. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong. Southwest Securities International Securities Limited is a subsidiary of Southwest Securities International Investment Limited.

TWN.summary: The Taiwan Fund, Inc. is a closed-ended equity mutual fund launched and managed by JF International Management Inc. It invests in the public equity markets of Taiwan. The fund seeks to invest in stocks of companies operating across diversified sectors. It employs fundamental analysis focusing on such factors as overall growth prospects, competitive position in the respective industry, technology, research, and development, productivity, labor costs, raw material costs and sources, profit margins, return on investment, capital resources, government regulation, and management to create its portfolio. The fund benchmarks the performance of its portfolio against the TAIEX Total Return Index. The Taiwan Fund, Inc. was formed on December 23, 1986 and is domiciled in the United States.

UOLI.summary: Uonlive Corporation focuses on the tea plantation and production related research, development, sale, trading, and consulting businesses primarily in Hong Kong. Its business focus also includes agricultural tourism. The company was formerly known as China World Trade Corporation and changed its name to Uonlive Corporation in July 2008. Uonlive Corporation is headquartered in Admiralty, Hong Kong.

VPGLF.summary: Value Partners Group Limited is a publicly owned investment manager. The firm manages separate client focused portfolios. The firm manages separate client-focused equity, fixed income, multi-asset, alternative portfolios, and quantitative investment solutions. The firm invests in the public equity and fixed income markets across the globe. It primarily provides investment management services to investment funds and managed accounts. The firm employs fundamental analysis with bottom-up stock picking approach. The firm conducts in-house research to make its investments. Value Partners Group Limited was founded on 1993 and is based in Hong Kong with additional offices in Beijing, Boston, Shanghai, Shenzhen, Kuala Lumpur, Singapore and London.

WAY.F.summary: Shenwan Hongyuan (H.K.) Limited, an investment holding company, engages in brokerage, corporate finance, asset management, financing and loan, and investment and other businesses in Hong Kong. The company operates in five segments: Enterprise Finance, Personal Finance and Wealth Management, Institutional Services and Trading, Investment Management, and Others. It offers stock underwriting sponsor, bond underwriting, and financial advisory services for corporate clients; and external equity investment, debt investment, other investments, and structured financing solutions. The company also provides securities, futures, and options brokerage services; and wealth management, OTC, and securities margin financing products to individual customers and non-professional institutional investors. In addition, it provides stock brokerage and trading services; research advisory, and investment and financing solutions; and sales, trading, hedging, and over-the-counter derivative services to institutional clients, as well as sells and trades in fixed income bonds, currencies, and commodities. Further, the company offers asset management, investment advisory, and public and private fund management services. Additionally, it offers management and treasury, and share custodian and nominee services; leases computer equipment; and holds properties. The company was formerly known as Shenyin Wanguo (H.K.) Limited and changed its name to Shenwan Hongyuan (H.K.) Limited in May 2015. Shenwan Hongyuan (H.K.) Limited was incorporated in 1972 and is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

WSL.L.summary: Worldsec Limited, a closed-ended investment company, invests in small to medium sized trading companies in the Greater China and South East Asian regions. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Sheung Wan, Hong Kong.

YUIA.F.summary: Planetree International Development Limited, an investment holding company, engages in treasury management, financial, and money lending businesses in Hong Kong. The company is involved in trading and holding debt and equity securities; financing and securities investment activities; property leasing; dealing in futures contracts; and securities investment activities. It also offers corporate management services; securities brokerage and financial services; and asset management services. The company was formerly known as Yugang International Limited and changed its name to Planetree International Development Limited in July 2019. Planetree International Development Limited is headquartered in North Point, Hong Kong.

YUM.F.summary: SHK Hong Kong Industries Limited is a publicly owned investment manager. The company invests primarily in telecommunications, properties for sale and rent, infrastructure and logistics, hotel operation, food and beverage, and transportation sectors. It prefers to invest in Hong Kong, Singapore, United States, Japan, Malaysia, Taiwan, and China. SHK Hong Kong Industries Limited was formerly known as Yu Ming Investments Limited. SHK Hong Kong Industries Limited was founded in 1990 and is based in Wanchai, Hong Kong.

YUSG.summary: YUS International Group Limited does not have significant operations. The company intends to seek and identify appropriate business opportunity for the development of new line of business. Previously, it provided brainstorming, storyboarding, commercials and advertisement production, and media planning services to advertisers in Hong Kong. The company was formerly known as Asian Trends Media Holdings, Inc. and changed its name to YUS International Group Limited in March 2013. YUS International Group Limited was incorporated in 2002 and is based in Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong.
